title: FPS fluctuation from 150 to 20
body:
my laptop specs (kind of old)

intel dual core i5
video card nvidia geforce 520mx
6 gb ram

windows 7 64 bits.

I keep getting low fps in different scenarios..i mean, it spikes, from 150 to 20,60  etc. 

I tried everything i coud think of, change game settings to low, disable alot of stuff, so i can make my laptop run faster.

I understand its an old latop, but, for league, it should not be:P..maybe somebody has a fix.

I would like,to make the game use more rams, to run better..anyway i can do this?..currently, it uses only 1 or 2 gb

replies.body: already did..i am on this for 2 days///last thing i need to do, is to reinstall the OS. i do have a question, if you can help with it. I would like to change my nvidia settings for the game, but, i do not know if it changes the client, or the actual game

You'll be able to change some settings through the client, just make sure you're navigating through in-game settings and not the client.  Just keep in mind that those are only some settings, and you'll have more options like video options while in a match (can use a custom for that)!

If you run into anymore issues, feel free to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can help!

ok, than you..i will contact them after i reinstall my OS

Frame drops isn't just limited to hardware specs, but also outdated drivers or even bad game files.  My suggestion would be to go through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up a bit and get some frames back.  :D  Let me know if it helps!
